name: Gassy Dancer [LD42]
description:
Ludum Dare 42 entry "Running Out of Space"

Play as the gassy dancer as you try to dance without getting your feet stepped on! Clear the room with a powerful toot and keep on dancing 'til the cows come home!

Instructions:
F/V/N/J - Select Dance Move

Space - Hit the marker
G/H - Build-up gas
Space - Release gas
